analysis.key_quote: STOP POLITICIZING THE CIVIL SERVICE.  These rules will do exactly the opposite of what is claimed -- they will allow any administration to come in an replace hard working, apolitical civil servants who have dedicated their career to this country with politically motivated sycophants.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule by highlighting concerns about the politicization of the civil service and the potential replacement of dedicated civil servants with politically motivated individuals.
